message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12000?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13500. It's still a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the value you're getting.
Hi Alice, thank you for the revised offer. I'm still looking for a better deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12500?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise again. I can offer it to you for $13000. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great price for the value you'll get.
Hi Alice, thank you for the revised offer. I'm still looking for a better deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12800?
Hi Bob, I'm starting to get close to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $12900. This is the best I can do, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
Hi Alice, I understand you're getting close to your minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12450?
Hi Bob, I'm really close to my minimum price now. I can offer it to you for $12750. This is as low as I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
Hi Alice, I understand you're really close to your minimum price. I'm willing to make one more attempt to reach a deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12500?
Hi Bob, I understand you're making one last attempt. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I can offer it to you for $12750. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
